H0.text: Just like par in golf, what is the term given to the line in skiing where most skiers aim to land. Optimal Line

H1.text: Just like par in golf, what is the term given to the line in skiing where most skiers aim to land. Target Zone

H2.text: Just like par in golf, what is the term given to the line in skiing where most skiers aim to land. Landing Mark

H3.text: Just like par in golf, what is the term given to the line in skiing where most skiers aim to land. K-line

A4.text: The distance score is related to the construction point (also known as the K-point), which is a line drawn in the landing area and serves as a 'target' for the competitors to reach.
